e1.Name: Fire
e1.EventDescription: Roll the die to see where it starts. You then continue rolling it to see if it spreads(see rules for more details)

e2.Name: Fog
e2.EventDescription: Draw and discard the top five cards from the deck

e3.Name: Mysterious Murders
e3.EventDescription: Each player takes it in turn to roll the die and remove one minion from the area rolled , even if it does not contain a trouble marker

e4.Name: Riots
e4.EventDescription: If there are eight or more trouble markers on the board then the game ends immediately

e5.Name: Subsidence
e5.EventDescription: All players must pay 2$ for each building they have or remove it instead

e6.Name: Trolls
e6.EventDescription: Roll die three times and place one troll minion piece in each area

e7.Name: Bloody Stupid Johnson
e7.EventDescription: Roll the die. If the city area card of the same value is in the play then the card is placed to one side. The owner of the card must also remove one of his minions from the same area as the card

e8.Name: Demons from the Dungeon Dimensions
e8.EventDescription: Roll the die four times and place one demon minion piece in each area rolled. See rules for effect

e9.Name: The Dragon
e9.EventDescription: Roll the die to see where it lands. Remove all pieces from the area

e10.Name: Earthquake
e10.EventDescription: Roll the die twice and remove any building in those area

e11.Name: Explosion
e11.EventDescription: Roll one die and remove any building in that area

e12.Name: Flood
e12.EventDescription: Roll the die twice to see which areas are affected. If the area rolled is adjacent to the river then player must move their minions to adjacent areas. Trolls and demons remain in the area
